title: Lost Monastery Adventure #4
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ancient Meditation Chamber
rooms.description: A circular stone chamber with faded murals depicting enlightened monks. Prayer cushions are scattered across the floor. Incense burners sit cold and empty. Shafts of dusty light filter through cracks in the ceiling. The air is still and heavy with centuries of silence.

items.name: pile of prayer cushions
items.description: Old meditation cushions stacked in the corner

items.name: small brass key
items.description: A tarnished brass key with a lotus flower engraved on it

items.name: stone altar
items.description: A simple altar with three offering bowls and a locked compartment beneath

items.name: meditation scroll
items.description: An ancient scroll with faded writing
items.text: The path to enlightenment requires 108 prostrations. Master Chen founded this monastery in the year 1392. Remember: the abbot's wisdom is found in sacred texts, his resting place is the mountain peak, and his true name was Rinzen.

items.name: heavy iron key
items.description: A large iron key with intricate Buddhist symbols

items.name: locked wooden chest
items.description: A cedar chest bound with iron bands and a brass lock

items.name: monastery chronicle
items.description: A leather-bound book recording the monastery's history
items.text: Chronicle of the Mountain Monastery: Founded by Master Chen in 1392, this sanctuary has housed generations of monks seeking enlightenment. The sacred library contains our most precious texts. Abbot Rinzen, our greatest teacher, achieved enlightenment and ascended from the mountain peak in 1445.

items.name: heavy wooden door
items.description: A thick wooden door carved with lotus flowers, leading to the library

rooms.name: Sacred Library
rooms.description: A vast chamber lined with wooden shelves holding ancient texts and scrolls. Dust motes dance in beams of light from high windows. A large reading table dominates the center. The smell of old paper and sandalwood fills the air. Stone steps lead upward to the north.

items.name: reading table
items.description: A massive wooden table with carved dragon legs

items.name: book of sutras
items.description: A collection of Buddhist teachings and wisdom
items.text: The Diamond Sutra: All conditioned things are like dreams, illusions, bubbles, and shadows. The wise monk knows that true wisdom is found in the sacred texts of the library, where knowledge is preserved for eternity.

items.name: ancient bookshelf
items.description: Tall shelves filled with manuscripts and scrolls

items.name: biography of Abbot Rinzen
items.description: A detailed account of the monastery's greatest teacher
items.text: Abbot Rinzen: Born in 1380, he became abbot in 1420. Known for his profound wisdom and compassion. After 25 years of teaching, he achieved final enlightenment and departed from the mountain peak, leaving behind only his prayer beads and a message: 'Seek the summit where earth meets sky.'

items.name: map of the mountain
items.description: A hand-drawn map showing the monastery and surrounding peaks
items.text: The map shows the monastery built into the mountainside. A path leads from the library to the summit. A note reads: 'The mountain peak is where Abbot Rinzen achieved enlightenment and ascended to nirvana.'

items.name: stone stairway
items.description: Ancient stone steps leading upward, blocked by a ceremonial gate. Three questions are carved into the gate's surface.

password_questions.question: What was the abbot's true name?
password_questions.hint: Check the meditation scroll and the abbot's biography

password_questions.question: Where is wisdom preserved?
password_questions.hint: The book of sutras mentions where knowledge is kept

password_questions.question: Where did the abbot achieve enlightenment?
password_questions.hint: Read the abbot's biography and the mountain map carefully

rooms.name: Mountain Summit
rooms.description: You stand at the peak of the mountain, above the clouds. The monastery lies far below. Prayer flags flutter in the wind. A simple stone shrine marks the spot where Abbot Rinzen achieved enlightenment. The view stretches endlessly in all directions. A sense of profound peace washes over you. You have found the path to freedom.

items.name: enlightenment shrine
items.description: A humble shrine with offerings of flowers and incense, marking the sacred spot

items.name: colorful prayer flags
items.description: Strings of flags carrying prayers and blessings on the wind

items.name: Abbot Rinzen's prayer beads
items.description: The sacred prayer beads left behind by the enlightened master, resting on the shrine

rooms.win_message: You have reached the mountain summit where Abbot Rinzen achieved enlightenment! As you stand at this sacred peak, you feel a profound sense of peace and understanding. The path to freedom was not just physical, but spiritual. You have solved the mysteries of the Lost Monastery and found your way to liberation. You win!
